newsitem.title: USA: Hartford Steam Boiler forms holding company.
newsitem.headline: Hartford Steam Boiler forms holding company.

text.p: Hartford Steam Boiler Inspection and Insurance Co said Monday its shareholders approved a proposal to form a new holding company called HSB Group Inc.

Formation of the holding company will provide gerater operating and financial flexibility than is available under the current corporate structure, said Gordon Kreh, president and chief executive officer of Hartford Steam Boilder.

Shareholders of the equipment insurance breakdown provider will automatically become holders of HSB Group's common stock through a share exchange, it said. Certificates representing Hartford Steam Boilder common stock will now represent corresponding shares of HSB Group, it said.
The stock will continue to be traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol HSB, it said.
The company said its board at a meeting today declared a regularly quarterly dividend of $0.57 a share, payable July 31 to shareholders of record July 10.
